Posts.Content: Feb 19, 2013 09:54AM Birdie28 wrote: Hi, there.  I do understand the disappointed feeling, so while you celebrate your good news, give yourself some special relaxation and permission to be frustrated with more tests and waiting.  It sounds like that you have had all the right tests and careful monitoring.  I have not had near the journey you've had but am already frustrated with the process of one test leading to another test to another anxiety-ridden waiting period, all while being assured that the breast surgeon does not think cancer.    I wish I had more helpful advice, but it does make perfect sense that you can't be joyous about more waiting.  I hope the time passes by quickly for you.
Posts.Title: Excisional biopsy. SueInMN fresitabr787
